title: Register for Zad Academy taught by Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem | Fiqh & Seerah @academyzaden
transcript: Before we take the following callers, I would like to bring your attention that it is now time for those interested in registering in Zad Academy. So we basically teach you what each and every Muslim must know in order to be a Muslim, the basics, but through an academic process that is totally free. And it's Alhamdulillah coming to your doorsteps, whether through Zad TV, whether it is through YouTube, whether through social media, totally free and totally reliable.
